title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 483.4 - Designation of fiscal officer; duties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 483.4 - Designation of fiscal officer; duties

State Regulations
(a) The Director of State Police Fiscal

Management, having an office at division headquarters, shall be the division's
fiscal officer. (b) The fiscal
officer shall maintain a record setting forth the name, public office address, title and salary of every officer or employee of the division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
483.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
